body.name: How to Seduce a Rockstar: A Steamy Rockstar Romance Novel (Bad Boys of Rock Book 1)
body.description: Grab your backstage pass and prepare to be rocked by this sizzling rockstar romance!TaliaMy life is getting boring. A little too predictable. I need to shake things up a bit, so my roommate helps me come up with a plan to add some sizzle back into my relationship with my boyfriend.The plan? Nailed it. Everything goes down without a hitch. Except for one teeny, tiny catch. Actually, it’s a colossal one. Yep, it's a disaster—because it turns out the guy in my boyfriend’s bed … is not my boyfriend. Oops.Boring and predictable are the least of my worries now.RyderI’ve got a million reasons to steer clear of Talia Bennett, the girl who gave me the surprise awakening of my life. Aside from my chaotic rock and roll lifestyle and the thousands of miles between us, she’s all about settling down when I’m allergic to commitment. So why can’t I keep my distance from her?When it comes to Talia, I just can’t resist. I need to make her mine.How to Seduce a Rockstar is a full-length, steamy rockstar romance, with a laugh-out-loud and super-spicy meet-cute, a dirty-talking hero, a strong and feisty heroine, and a satisfying happily ever after.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time reading this author and loved it!! Was worried about the accidental sex and how it could be but the whole book was so good. Had all the feeling I lol and cried can't wit for more books in this series. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hooked from the beginning. I loved this book. Will definitely read the next book in the series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ryder and Talia. #OLD
reviews.reviewText: How to Seduce a Rockstar: A Steamy Rockstar Novel (Bad Boys of Rock Book 1) by Arabella Quinn begins with a spicy scene that is so hot I expected smoke to waft from my iPad’s Kindle app. It all starts with Ryder, guitarist with the rock band “Ghost Parker,” deciding to crash at college buddy Max’s apartment before going home to see his family. Talia is Max’s girlfriend who ends up fighting with each other more than a loving couple with a three-year history. After another fight on Max’s birthday in a bar, they leave separately. With her girlfriend egging her on and plying her with lots of liquid courage in shots, Talia goes to Max’s apartment to fulfill Max’s favorite fantasy she nicknames “OLD.”I am still LOL, so you must read the book to find out what the letters stand for. Ryder and Talia have an encounter that rocks both of their worlds. Finding a way to forge their lives together is quite a feat that they both want to try. Ryder keeps so much locked inside himself and tries solving all problems without help from others until his life implodes. Misunderstanding and jealousy drive Talia away from Ryder. Ryder finally seeks help ways to win back his girl. He sends gifts and writes letters to Talia as he begins to share what happened when she visited him in California. As a former college grad, I feel Ryder letters could be something a guy could write on paper as easier than in person. Regardless, I was cheering for the HEA when it was finally realized. I loved this book so much that I looked for the back catalog of her books by Arabella Quinn to read about the other band mentioned in How To Seduce a Rockstar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have some very favorite books but THISSSSS!!! My gosh, i laughed, i cried… i reread!!!! Amazing story, so truthful and real!! To Ryder & Talia… lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Too funny! I was definitely familiar with the meet-cute, but this had to have fallen under the new category of meet-awkward 🤣😬I actually started to like Ryder pretty much right away (despite some of his flaws). He certainly seemed to be more redeemable than Max, at least.My biggest issues with the book were probably the very unexpected plot-twists/complications caused by that piece of trash, Stan, and all of the awful consequences that resulted from that situation. I really thought there’d be a different outcome. I also felt like there were some open holes in the story that should’ve been sewn up. Some, I expect will come in further books, but it just felt incomplete in some aspects.It was a pretty quick read though & turned out to be times right with my (unfortunate) Covid recovery, so that was a plus.I’ll be trying out book 2 straightaway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this book!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Such an amazing story I stayed up all night reading it. It was well worth losing the sleep it a must read!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wow, just wow! I have truly enjoyed Ryder and Tallia‘s story. I so enjoyed the way they met, and how she got rid of Max. I truly enjoyed how Ryder’s friends rallied around him when he found out about Stan. His childhood had been one of abandonment, but his eyes were opened and he was able to see. Tallia was strong and loyal, and knew what she wanted, but wasn’t willing to give herself up for it. Thankfully, Ryder was Able to express his feelings and let his love shine through. Can’t wait for more,love all the side characters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don’t usually review, but this was great! Heartfelt and relatable despite being a rock star romance. His “apologies” were soooo romantic. All men should take note!!
Amazing read and I loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved Ryder and Talia.Excellent writing and thoroughly enjoyable storyline.This is my first book from Arabella Quinn and I thoroughly enjoyed it. I like her writing style, the funny moments and the teary moments. All the characters are brilliant and, when I finish this series, I will go back to the Cold Fusion series. I think I need to read bout “Crazy” Livvy!
OMG THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST I HAVE READ IT BROUGHT OUT EVERY EMOTION .YOU FELT ALL THE UPS AND DOWNS WITH THESE CHARACTERS.THOSE LETTERS HAD ME IN TEARS THANKS FOR AN AWESOME READ

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First book I've read by this author. I am a big fan of Rockstar romances and I enjoyed this book.The way Ryan and Talia met is certainly not a 'meet cute' that you'll be seeing in a Hollywood RomCom any time soon 🤣. A case of mistaken identity in bed.Ryder is immature, a man whore and there are plenty if pictures on the Internet to prove it. Obviously, Talia has doubts but her strong attraction to Ryder and the connection she feels takes over.This book is funny. I enjoyed Ryder getting locked in the cellar with 'Crazy' Livvy. This series has characters from 'Rock Me' series by the same author which I might read because I love Livvy! You don't have to read that series first though!

This was a good romantic read along with some scintillating scenes. I really enjoyed all the multiple character interactions. There were some very poignant parts in the storyline that really tore up my heart.Good Stuff!!
